fields.help_desc: We'll design, hang, and run a lighting setup to make you look great, but we'll only use a few fixtures (12 tops) and will just keep them lit for the entire show. This is definitely not enough light for the Alden main stage.

We'll design, hang, and run a lighting setup to make you look great, and we'll use enough fixtures to fulfill most campus events. We'll also dim and adjust these how you like during the show, which includes using the colored or moving lights. This is still not enough light for the Alden main stage.

We'll design, hang, and run a lighting setup to make you look great, and we'll use plenty of fixtures to fulfill all but the biggest of campus events. We'll dim and adjust these how you like during the show, including cues for any colored or moving lights, dramatic effects for concerts, etc.

We come in, set up microphones, and mix your show over an existing speakers. Note that this can only be used in places with a house sound system (for example, Alden or the Odeum) and typically fits small events with multiple people talking.

We bring in microphones, mixers, and a pair of our smaller speakers (they're still big and plenty loud, though!). We'll mix and tweak the show. This can be done anywhere, though if the event is on the entire Quad or you're doing a high-profile show in Alden, you might want something a bit bigger.

We bring in microphones, mixers, and a pair of our big speakers with matching subwoofers. We'll mix and tweak the show, going the extra mile to make it sound as good as possible. This can be done anywhere, and will fill just about any venue with the glorious sound of your voice. We can also add additional communication (ie. cues backstage) for shows in Alden.

16mm Projection:
$20 plus $12 for every 40-minute reel. This includes benching and de-benching 40-minute reels, CD/house sound before and after movie (if provided).

35mm Projection:
$30 plus $10 for every 20-minute reel. This includes benching and de-benching 20-minute reels, CD/house sound before and after movie (if provided), projection of 16mm cartoon before (if provided) and projection of previews (if provided).

70mm Projection:
$55 plus $15 for every 20-minute reel. This includes benching and de-benching 20-minute reels, CD/house sound before and after movie (if provided), projection of 16mm cartoon before (if provided) and projection of previews (if provided).

We'll design, hang, and run a lighting setup to make you glow, and we'll use as many fixtures as needed to make your large event shine. We'll dim and adjust these how you like during the show, including cues for any colored or moving lights, dramatic effects for concerts, etc.

What's better than two big speakers? Four big speakers, with four matching subwoofers. For the largest of events, this will blow the roof or let you hear the faintest timbres of a piano. We'll mic, mix, tweak thoroughly, and make sure it fits your needs. *For small venues, this is definitely overkill*.

Digital Projection:
$20 for the first 20 minutes of use, $7 for each additional 20 minutes of use.

fields.name: Moving Head Fixtures
fields.desc: Add moving head lighting to your lighting event.

fields.name: Outdoor Event
fields.desc: This surcharge is assessed for an event which is held outdoors.

fields.name: Strobe Light
fields.desc: A surcharge for a specialty strobe light. This line item is per strobe light, not per pair however we suggest requesting them in pairs.

fields.name: Blacklight
fields.desc: This surcharge is for 1 custom high output blacklight blaster. Blacklights are a great add on for any dance or party type event.

fields.name: Followspot
fields.desc: Highlight an important person or object. NOTE: There is an additional per-hour surcharge for this item. Contact lnl-vp@wpi.edu for further details.

fields.name: Outdoor Light
fields.desc: Shine a light on the outside of your favorite campus building! We have a variety of fixtures to chose from that can generate all different types of effects and/or looks.

fields.name: Wireless Microphone
fields.desc: Get rid of that pesky cord! Make sure your audience can hear you wherever you are. We have a variety of different types of transmitters that allow a performer hold, clip, or wear their microphone. Contact lnl-vp@wpi.edu for further information.

fields.name: Live Performer Package
fields.desc: This package allows for the use of compressors and delays. This package also includes two (2) monitor mixes.

fields.name: Concert Package
fields.desc: This package induces the use of up to 40 channels as well as the use of compressors and delays. This package also includes four (4) monitor mixes.

fields.name: Monitor Mix
fields.desc: Allow your performers to hear each-other and themselves. This item induces up to two (2) speakers per mix.

fields.name: CD Player
fields.desc: A magical devices that plays the magical shinny round disks. This is a must have for those who do not trust the cloud.

fields.name: Additional 16 Inputs
fields.desc: This upgrade allow your event to use an additional sixteen (16) inputs on top of the number of inputs already allowed for your event type.

fields.name: Additional 20 Minutes Digital Projection
fields.desc: Each Additional 20 Minutes of Digital Projection
